reviews.review_text: Went there 3 times!! Still so surprised how authentic these dishes are! If you are looking for the original spice level of Thai food, this is the place for you. I love all the salad dishes that remind me of my hometown. Wish the portion are a bit bigger!!

This Thai restaurant is amazing!! Food and staff exceeds expectations. Authentic taste and many unique dishes. Definitely coming back soon! Highly recommend the crispy shrimp toast and the mango sticky rice.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Amazing service & food! Loved how they come and really check up on you. They are really open to feedback as they are soft opening and Sean was super welcoming. My favourite is the crying tiger, especially the Chili sauce        the sticky mango is also very tasty, with the balance of crunchiness and softness. Really good lunch promo going on right now so I ll definitely be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review! Were thrilled to hear that you had an amazing experience at our establishment and enjoyed our service and food. Cant wait to serve you again soon! Zab Bite Team

reviews.review_text: Authentic, delicious, flavorful Thai food.   We visited during their soft opening and we were not disappointed.  The green curry was so flavorful and rich.   The mango sticky rice dessert was also very tasty.   Definitely would recommend.   Dishes were customized to accommodate our food allergies too.

Cozy little gem that serves up the best Thai food I ve had in Vancouver yet! Service is equally as warm and welcoming and was very helpful with suggestions and accommodations on their menu. I highly recommended the crying tiger, pad se ew and boat noodle; thick noodles are a must. Definitely give this place a try if you re looking for authentic Thai food!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the food, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: My friends and I had the pleasure of dining at Zab Bite restaurant, a gem of a Thai restaurant in town. From the moment we stepped in, the ambiance set the stage for what was an unforgettable evening. The decor, an elegant blend of traditional Thai elements and modern touches, created a welcoming and lively atmosphere. The service was exceptional. Our server was knowledgeable, attentive, and had great suggestions for our diverse group. We started with Assorted Appetizers, Veggie spring rolls, crispy pork toast, shrimp wrap, and pork jerky. Each dish was a hit, perfectly balanced in flavors and textures. The main courses were a delightful journey through Thai cuisine. The green curry with chicken was rich and aromatic, with just the right level of spice. The Pad Thai was simply the best Ive ever had, with a perfect blend of sweet, sour, and great flavors. We also tried a lesser-known dish, Khao Soi, which was a revelation with its creamy coconut curry and tender noodles. What truly made the night special was the shared joy of exploring these flavors with friends. The portions were generous, ideal for sharing, and it sparked lively conversations and shared laughter. To end the meal, we indulged in mango sticky rice and Thai iced tea, which were the perfect sweet notes to conclude a fantastic meal. In summary, Zab Bite restaurant is not just about extraordinary Thai food; it s about the experience of sharing delicious, well-crafted dishes with good company in a beautiful setting. It s a must-visit for anyone looking to enjoy Thai cuisine at its best. A solid 5 stars for the amazing food, ambiance, and service. Cant wait to return!

So tasty, I recommend Papaya salad, Kor Moo Yang, and Pad Krapow. If you don t eat too much spicy but want to feel a bit spicy , I recommend to tell them spicy level is  Medium . It s a perfect one. The restaurants are super busy, try to come to the restaurant early.

I came here for the second time. I never regret choosing this restaurant. It tastes like authentic Thai food. Even better than some restaurants in Thailand. Personally I love spicy so much and this Thai restaurant uses real dried chilies. It makes our food more flavorful. But you can ask them for mild spicy as well. Reasonable price. Our waiter was very kind and polite. I m looking forward to coming back to Zab bite again. Highly recommend Kor moo yang!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nim, Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at Zab Bite! We are thrilled to hear that you chose to dine with us for the second time and that you have enjoyed our authentic Thai cuisine.

reviews.review_text: The food was AMAZING! It reminded me of the food I had in Thailand, so authentic. The staff is very nice and helpful too. Will definitely come back!

I had an amazing dining experience at this new Thai restaurant in Vancouver. The food was authentically delicious, the staff was friendly, and the ambiance was perfect. Its now my top choice for Thai cuisine in the city! Highly recommend them for a dine-in experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mahnoush! We glad you enjoyed the experience at Zab Bite and I hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I tried this restaurant during their soft opening and was so impressed with the flavours of every dish! I ordered the Tofu Pad Thai, Papaya Salad, Crispy Shrimp Toast, Tom Yum Soup, Boat Noodles and Khao Soi. Will definitely be checking out this place again to try other dishes.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the recent visit, we are glad to hear that you enjoyed the food. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon and can t wait for you to try other dishes!

reviews.review_text: Was excited to try this place after reading the reviews and boy oh boy it did not disappoint! Super amazing flavors, really nice spice, everything tasted so good. Service was a tad slow, but all in all it was great and can t wait to go back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: If you re a fan of authentic Thai food, this place is an absolute must-try!!! The Nam Tok Moo Yang, Salmon and Som Tum Corn are my favourite. Will come back and try boat noodle and ka prow next time!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the food, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I really love their foods! It really reminds me of my hometown. Really authentic E-Sarn Thai foods! I highly recommend you to try all here. They re the best!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the food, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Cozy restaurant with exceptional service and friendly staff. I got the boat noodles and was pleasantly surprised by the large portion of meat. The crispy toast and mango sticky rice are also must-tries. This will definitely be my go-to spot for Thai food from now on.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the awesome review Lydia! Glad to hear that you enjoyed our boat noodle and mango sticky rice! We are looking forward to seeing you again very soon for other delicious dishes

reviews.review_text: Came here for dinner with some friends during their soft opening and the food and service did not disappoint. We ordered the Shrimp Wrap, Crying Tiger, Tum Thai, Tom Yum, and Pad Thai. Their Tom Yum, is a bit different than others that I ve had - it s more creamy and hard to say no to a second bowl. The staff also came by a few times to check up on you and they are really open to feedback. Will definitely be back to try the rest of the menu!
we had a lovely meal, the flavours fresh and delicious, the staff VERY friendly and helpful. Their suggestions were very appreciated, as I m new to Thai cuisine
Highly recommend! I would say this is the best Thai authentic restaurant in Vancouver. The taste of the food will make you feel like you re in Thailand. We will come back for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the fantastic review!

reviews.review_text: The food and service was great! Love the ambiance! Great for family gathering or frineds hanging out or even date nights! They re very busy even on weekday nights! Fern is so nice and make us feel very welcome! We love her!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lalaine, Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: An absolute gem for authentic Thai cuisine! The food here is exceptional. Be sure to order the Nam Tok Crying Tiger   its a must-try. Im looking forward to exploring their cocktail menu on my next visit.

reviews.review_text: Arguably the best authentic Thai restaurant in town. True north east flavours! Great friendly service. Highly recommend trying it out.
Real Thai E-san food confirm by Thai (me). When they say Thai spicy they mean it so dont dare them if you cant eat spicy. I love all the dish and drink I ordered. Go check it out (;
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review! Thai food wouldnt be authentic if there is no option for Thai spicy. Glad to hear that you love the food and drink, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I took my local friend here and we were enjoying our time. The food was just so great from beverages to main dishes to dessert. It is authentic thai food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review! Our team is delighted to hear that you enjoyed the experience at Zab Bite!

reviews.review_text: Authentic Thai taste. Pad Se Ew is great. I also recommend Yum Noodle Pla Ra. I like the combination of noodle and sweet&sour taste. Nice atmosphere. Love it Food

My first time in this Thai restaurant was amazing. First the parking, you can park in front of the restaurant or beside it No parking fee !! Food was amazing  and you can adjust the flavor by adding or vinegar, fish sauce, spicy by yourself just like Thailand !!  Seasoning station is at the counter.

I was wandering around Fraser Hood looking at fall leaves and I wandered into Zab Bite out of curiosity. The food was   and my drink was refreshing. Service was  I love the orange colour of this corner location! The decor and vibe with the light wood and accents of orange is modern and cozy. Very memorable meal here, Id say its a must try!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Angela! Thank you for sharing your fantastic experience at Zab Bite! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the meal and the service we provide. Our team is looking forward to welcoming you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Very authentic northeastern Thai cuisine. Pad see ew, crispy pork toast, and Nam tok kor moo yang were my favorites. Cha yen is one of the best you can fine in Vancouver too.

Cute little restaurant with amazing staff and amazing food! We came to Zab Bite on a busy and rainy afternoon, and we were received by smiley, kind, and polite staff! We tried the  Tom Kha soup, and it tasted like heaven! If you like coconut, this is your GO TO! We also had the Pad SeEw Stir fry with chicken, and it was phenomenal! So delicious!!!  100% recommended!

Went to this restaurant during the soft opening period. I would say that this is the only authentic Thai-Isaan restaurant in Vancouver. The foods are fantastic, taste like actual foods that you can find only in Thailand s Northeastern provinces. Crying tiger is a must-try.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the food, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: THE BEST THAI FOOD YOU WILL FIND IN VANCOUVER. At least at their soft launch. Also, THE BEST MANGO STICKY RICE. The rice has a slight saltiness to balance the sweetness and creaminess. Texture is 9.5/10. The crispy topping definitely adds more texture to it. I grew up in Thailand and I tell you that this taste is exactly what I had at home. I ve tried many Thai restaurants and around here and I can enjoy most of them but can t say they re authentic. They also have local Thai drinks that you won t find anywhere else in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the food, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Very good !! Taste is real Thai food !! Come to test it by yourself I m really recommend. Food : 5/5 |

reviews.review_text: Went there for the first time with a friend. I was never a big fan of Thai but their crying tiger salad, pad Thai, and drunken noodles were amazing. Staff is great and attentive, tables and bathrooms are clean, music is not too loud so people can have conversations.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Its a great cozy Thai restaurant with awesome service! I had drunken noodle. It was spicy and so delicious! I will definitely go back again. Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I recently dined at Zab Bite, which just had its soft opening last week, and I must say I was quite impressed. The overall experience left me with a positive impression. The standout feature of this restaurant is the flavorful Thai cuisine. The dishes were undeniably tasty, and I found myself savoring every bite. I d like to make a special mention of the Khao Soi, the curry noodles. While it was delicious, I thought it could benefit from a bit more broth to make it truly exceptional. The staff at Zab Bite were incredibly friendly and attentive throughout our meal, which added to the pleasant atmosphere. The restaurant itself had a fresh, new look, and it s evident that they ve put effort into creating an inviting space. Personal favorites are important, and mine at Zab Bite has to be the Somtum Pla Ra. It s a must-try for anyone who appreciates authentic Thai flavors.if you like thai anchovy sauce
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Bank, thank you very much for your review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the experience at Zab Bite. As a new restaurant in this lovely city, we are committed to bringing you on the most authentic Thai food journey. Som Tum Pla ra is definitely one of our signatures, you should have it with Tom Zab and Kor Moo Yang the next time you visit!

reviews.review_text: Visit first time for this new Thai Esan restaurant from friend s recommendation and invited. I love Esan food : like unique presented taste and menus from Thailands northeast region. I really love how they re  present Thai foods in their signature way. We ordered : Som tum Khao Pod with salted egg (Recommended) This dish is my fav from Thailand. And here not disappointed me and make me feel that I am in Thailand. It very good combination with corn, tomato, green bean, carrot and roasted peanuts in sour & spicy dressing. Plus salted eggs. Seriously One order not enough for me. (Spicy level is optional) Pad see Iew : If you love stir fried/fresh rice medium thick noodle / Gailan vegetables/ eggs and meat. This dish Must try. How they create all combinations with sauce is so delicious  for me. Right amount of sauce and right temperature rice noodle cooking with cooked gailan. Num tok  Korea moo yang : this dish was present with authentic way same in Thailand. If you in love with spicy. Please don t missed. They brought Thailand to here. Don t forget to order sticky rice (variety of cultivated short-grain rice grown  that becomes  sticky when cooked) forc eating  with it. Will visit you again soon
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your fantastic experience at Zab Bite. Its wonderful to know that you appreciated how we present Thai dishes in our signature way. We cant wait to welcome you back soon for another delightful culinary journey. Thank you for your support and for sharing your experience with us. From Zab Bite Team

reviews.review_text: My new favorite Thai restaurant. All the dishes that we ordered were so yummy

Popped by for dinner and luckily was able to get seated at the last table. Unfortunately they were out of the Pad Sew Ew, which just means I ll have to come back again to try it. Settled on the Pad Thai and Boat noodles. Both were full of flavour and delicious. It was so hard to narrow down from all the options on the menu.

A Taste of Thailand in Vancouvers Heart Rating:       (5/5) I recently had the pleasure of dining at Zab Bite, and I cant stop raving about this amazing Thai restaurant in Vancouver. From start to finish, the experience was nothing short of exceptional. First and foremost, the food at Zab Bite is an absolute delight for the taste buds. The menu boasts an impressive array of Thai dishes, each bursting with authentic flavors and fresh ingredients. Whether youre a fan of classic Pad Thai, a spice enthusiast craving some Tom Yum soup, or looking for something more adventurous like their signature pineapple fried rice, Zab Bite has you covered. Every dish I tried was a symphony of flavors that transported me straight to Thailand. The ambiance of the restaurant is charming and cozy, making it the perfect spot for a date night or a gathering with friends and family. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring that we felt welcome and well taken care of throughout our meal. What truly sets Zab Bite apart is their commitment to authenticity. The chefs use traditional Thai cooking techniques and spices, resulting in dishes that are not only delicious but also true to their cultural roots. Its evident that the team at Zab Bite is passionate about delivering an authentic Thai dining experience, and they excel in doing so. I must also mention their vegetarian and vegan options, which are plentiful and just as scrumptious as their meat counterparts. As a vegetarian, I appreciate a restaurant that goes the extra mile to cater to diverse dietary preferences. In conclusion, Zab Bite is a gem in Vancouvers culinary scene. If youre a Thai cuisine enthusiast or someone looking to explore the flavors of Thailand, I highly recommend paying a visit to this fantastic restaurant. Its an experience you wont forget, and I cant wait to return for more of their mouthwatering dishes. Zab Bite has certainly earned its spot on my list of favorite dining spots in the city!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the fantastic review and we are glad to hear that you enjoyed the experience. As a newly opened restaurant in the neighborhood, we are committed to bringing out the most authentic Thai food to our best capabilities!

reviews.review_text: The ONLY authentic Thai restaurant in Vancouver! Food is amazing, taste just like in Thailand. Great atmosphere, just renovated,  very clean and spacious. As a Thai person, this is one of the few Thai restaurant that I would recommend here.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the food, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: We had dinner at Zab Bite last night with a bunch of friends and everyone loved their food, great service and set up, I would definitely go back.

reviews.review_text: The most authentic taste of Thai food in town has just opened! Ive tried many dishes and fell in love with every single bite I have at ZabBite. My top 3 most favorite dishes must be their Kor Moo Yang, Som Tum Thai with salted egg, and Boat Noodle! These are just some of the example but other dishes are also incredibly and authentically delicious! Its on the pricy side but definitely worth it. This is the Thai place I have been waiting for in Vancouver!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the food, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I ate Som tum pla ra, Drunken noodles, Crispy toast, Goong hom pha and Nam tok kor moo yang. All of those are so delicious, made me Fly to the moon :) I have lived here for a while and always look for the best Thai restaurant. My husband is White Canadian, he loves quality, clean, tasty and fresh food here. If you are looking for an exact Thai taste, this restaurant is the best one here. Enjoy Thai food

reviews.review_text: The food was so AMAZING that we forgot to take a picture of the appetizers and mains. My favourite dish was the pork with sticky rice and the shrimp pad thai.

reviews.review_text: I recently dined at Zab-Bite and was thoroughly impressed. For someone who hadn t previously experienced authentic Thai cuisine, the flavors took me on a delightful journey. The dishes were a harmonious blend of spicy and savory, with each bite echoing the richness of Thai traditions. The Nam Tok Crying Tiger stood out as my favorite, and for dessert lovers, the Mango Sticky Rice is an absolute must-try. Highly recommended for an immersive Thai dining experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad you had a wonderful experience at Zab Bite and thank you for leaving us with the fantastic review. Nam Tok Crying Tiger is definitely one of our signatures here, but we also have Boat Noodle and papaya salad waiting for you to try! See you again soon, Hossein!

reviews.review_text: Pretty and cozy restaurant, friendly staff and very good quality of food. Overall, this place is a bit more expensive than some other places, but also much cheaper than a couple of the Thai fine-dining places, which charge double the amount and dont give much more value. In my opinion, I would return again knowing I am happy to pay a bit more for something more authentic and better quality than some of the other places Ive tried.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We greatly appreciate your thoughtful review. From Zab Bite Team

reviews.review_text: A lovely new Thai restaurant that tasted very flavourful and as authentic to Thailand spices and flavours! The service was attentive and very welcoming. Would definitely be back again!

Amazingly unique flavours Ive never experienced in other Thai restaurants in Vancouver.  The staff are very welcoming and patient in answering questions and recommending dishes. Will definitely be back again to try the rest of the menu!

Ive been a regular at this Thai restaurant for some time now, and I absolutely adore their delicious dishes. The service is fantastic, thanks to the friendly and helpful staff who guide us through the menu. Occasionally, there might be a short wait during busy hours, but the food always arrives promptly. Keep up the good work   Ill definitely be a regular here!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jira, We appreciate your wonderful review, and were delighted to know that youve been enjoying your visits. We assure you that we will maintain the same level of quality and service, and we eagerly anticipate your return soon!

reviews.review_text: An absolute must try. Prices are very fair, portions are very large, food is cooked to perfection and always tastes fresh. The staff is kind and the service is quick! Make sure to make a reservation at this delicious Thai spot because customers line up to try this wonderful new spot.

Excellent restaurant! The food is packed with flavours! The servers were really friendly and helped with our orders since we arent that familiar with Thai cuisine. Pad See Ew with prawns is a must-order. The Yum Salmon Zab is also really interesting as it pairs raw salmon with Thai spices. Will definitely come back again to explore more of the menu.
Delicious thai food and exceptional service. Will definitely go there more.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Came back for a 3rd time now - Honestly if I compare the price to some other Thai & Malaysian restaurants, the value is pretty good here and the quality is superb. Decided to write something this time as it s so evident that everyone here wants the best for you, I feel comfortable every time I come in and I thank you all and will be back soon for that Pad Se Ew
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!

reviews.review_text: Friendly environment with the best Thai food Ive had in Vancouver!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the food, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Amazing place Yummy foods Definitely will come again!! Food : 5/5
The best Thai E-sarn food in town! Love it
The server Benz so beautiful as their food yesterday

I can honestly say this is probably the best Thai restaurant I ve dined at in Western Canada. My wife grew up in Thailand so we eat a lot of Thai food at home and on the road. Zab Bite blew my expectations out of the water. The sticky rice was so soft like fresh rice from the fields in Thailand, the jeow dipping sauce gave me literal shivers lol, the beef is high quality and again tastes just like Thailand. My wife had the Pad Thai set and she says it brings her back to Thailand. The service was great which was nice considering it s so new and usually takes some months to get things in order. The price was more than fair for the size of the portions. And the cleanliness was spot on. Honestly, I can t come up with a single negative thing to say about this place .
The food was phenomenal! Tried 7 or 8 different dishes and each one was amazing nothing was bad . Can t wait to come back

Went here with my sister and you can tell when ingredients are fresh. The crying tiger was made so deliciously and with quality meat. They have many authentic options in the menu. Legit Thai in Vancouver. All Thai staff, authentic tasting Isan dishes. Will have to go back to try the other menu items for a more thorough assessment, but so far this place comes close to Thai food in Thailand. Am glad it opened.

reviews.review_text: Amazing all the way around. We had the lunch promo with Pad Se Ew, pork toast and lemon tea. The restaurant was full, but the server still had time to answer our questions about the neighborhood. Will definitely be back to try other dishes.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jodi! Thank you very much for leaving us with your fantastic review about your experience at Zab Bite! Our restaurant is nestled in a warm and welcoming neighborhood, and were eager to share it with everyone. Our team is looking forward to welcoming you again very soon!

reviews.review_text: Very Authentic Thai food. They have great variety of options for food as well as drinks. Definitely be going there more often.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: The food here was really authentic Thai. The servers were very nice and friendly. I love the atmosphere here. Good place to sit and chill after work. I recommend getting Som Tum Thai with salted egg (green papaya salad), Kor Moo Yang (grill pork neck) with sticky rice, Khao Pad Kra Pao Tray and veggie spring rolls. All the food I tried was so good. I would definitely come back here again.

Everything was amazing. The atmosphere was great, the service was amazing and the food was perfect. The deep fried tofu was so good, and I couldnt get enough of the pork toast. Will definately be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Thai food that is original and tasty! Friendly staff and service! Will come again

Great nice design, the orange is a nice attraction in the neighbourhood and interior is very beautiful. Brought the team here for our lunch break, everyone seemed to enjoy it - well definitely be coming back. We did end up ordering two more dishes for take out so our admin team can enjoy; I can definitely say that in-person was much better being very fresh and with the service but even with reheating the food at our office, our admin team said it was really good as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review! We hope to see you and your team at Zab Bite again soon!

reviews.review_text: First time in for me and the family . Food was great . Really enjoyed all the dishes we had . Servers were very attentive and pleasant.  Definately will be going again . Price point was really good . Food : 5/5
Came by today for my lunch break to try it out. Had a Herbal G&T and their Royal Pad Thai.. honestly, as one that doesnt often eat asian cuisine, it was very very good. Will definitely come back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to hear to enjoyed the Royal Pad Thai and one of our signature cocktails! We also have the popular Kor Moo Yang waiting for you to check out!

reviews.review_text: One of my new favorite Thai food in Vancouver! Everything was so authentic and made me feel flying back to Thailand. Dishes came in a generous portion. Love Som Tum Corn sooooo much!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience dining at our new Thai restaurant in Vancouver. We appreciate your detailed feedback and are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit!

reviews.review_text: Came here for dinner with a couple friends and the food was awesome. The server recommended the Pad See Ew with the pork and it was fantastic. The thai milk tea was also a fan favorite as well. With many different options, we are bound to come back here again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Been to many Thai restaurants in Vancouver and none of them cut it. This is the first one where it s authentic. Amazing food and service!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: One of the best Authentic taste of Thai food in Vancouver. Staff were friendly and full of smile even the table was full. I recommend yum salmon zab with plara and boat noodle with rice noodle. Really good!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experience at Zab Bite in Vancouver! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the dining experience at Zab Bite. We look forward to serving you again soon! Zab Bite Team

reviews.review_text: If you crave authentic thai esan dishes. This place will not disappoint you. I love every giah I ordered especially boat noodles. Really recommend
Just ordered a Thai Iced Tea. Its very good, not too sweet. Will update when I get my food. Edit: Food was delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Justin! Thank you very much for your fantastic review. Our team is delighted to hear that you enjoyed the food and beverage at Zab Bite! We look forward to welcoming you again for something other dishes and drinks

reviews.review_text: Recently tried the new Thai restaurant in Vancouver and was impressed. The flavors in the Som Tum Thai were authentic and the Nam Tok Kor Moo Yang had just the right kick! The nice atmosphere made the dining experience truly enjoyable. Will definitely be back again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I saw they were a new place so gave it a try. The place was packed on a friday night with a few people waiting outside. I havent seen it that busy before. Some of the best Pad Thai I have ever had. Much more eggy than I was used to and high quality ingredients. Would go back for the food. The place looks fairly casual but is priced on the higher end side of things. It was $20 for a pad thai before tax/tip
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Excellent experience, Love that this is in the Fraser hood. Food was extremely tasty and left me wanting to come back and try more off the menu.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Tried Zab bite for the first time when they opened and went back again on Saturday. Food and drinks were absolutely delicious both times and the staff was so friendly. Would highly recommended to anyone and excited to go back again soon.
A small cozy restaurant with excellent service and friendly staff. Food was delicious and beautifully done. 10/10 would recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the food, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: The Drunken Noodle was a flavor explosion, perfectly cooked and aromatic, paired with a refreshing Four Winds beer. Cozy ambiance, impeccable service authentic Thai cuisine at its best! The atmospheres inviting, and I cant wait to return for more culinary delights. A five-star dining experience thats a must-try!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Great food and service! We had a bowl of Tom Kha and Pad Se Ew. So good!

Zab-Bite.YVR, The Authentic North Eastern Thai Cuisine, well known for its spiciness, is better characterized by its complex balancing of distinct flavours which is the secret to mastering  North Eastern Thai food. Excellent environment, friendly service, great menu choices and decent food and at affordable prices, deserves five Stars
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your recent visit at Zab Bite, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: A cute little place, attentive staff, the Pad Thai was delicious. So thankful for the ease of ordering gluten free.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Helen for the review, we are committed to making sure everyone has a pleasant dining experience while enjoying the authentic Thai food! see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: just had dinner here with five friends, my friend won a giftcard and we were trying it out, the good is INCREDIBLE!!!! so flavourful and has a massive depth of taste!! the khao soi was delicious, the pad see ew as well, we also got the curried tofu which was rich, we had thom kha soup, and the springrolls, everything was so delicious. will be back for their lunch special too, an entree a main and a drink for 22 is a great great price!! thanks again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the fantastic review, and we are glad to hear that you had an amazing experience dining in at Zab Bite. We hope to see you again soon! Stay tuned for upcoming special giveaways on our Instagram page @zabbite.yvr. Be sure to follow us for updates!

reviews.review_text: The Best Thai Food in Vancouver. 100% confirmed by me, a Thai. You will not find this type of Thai food in Vancouver, and if you do, it wont be as authentic as this place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your valuable review, Our team is dedicated to delivering the most authentic and flavorful Thai cuisine to our cherished customers. Its our pleasure to bring a taste of authentic Thai food to Vancouver and create a memorable dining experience. From Zab Bite Team

reviews.review_text: Brand new thai spot on fraser. Chatted with the chef who was very friendly and said he had several restaurants in Thailand. Well it shows, my panang curry was excellent and my dad loved his pad thai.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Athal, Thank you very much for taking your time to leave this fantastic review. We look forward to welcoming you on your next visit, and our team is delighted to hear that you enjoyed the food! Zab Bite Team
